WebControl: Your Personal Web Time Tracker

Track time spent on websites and view your analytics!

Take control of your online time with WebControl, the ultimate Chrome extension for tracking and managing your web browsing habits. Here's what WebControl offers:

Domain-specific time tracking: See exactly how much time you spend on each website.
Most visited sites list: Discover your top websites at a glance.
Current tab timer: Stay aware of time spent on your active tab in real-time.
Visual insights: View an intuitive pie chart of your most visited sites for easy analysis.
Activity heatmap: Identify your most active hours throughout the day.

Whether you're aiming to boost productivity, reduce distractions, or simply gain insights into your browsing habits, WebControl provides the data you need. Install now to start making informed decisions about your online time and take the first step towards a more balanced digital life.
